alert.note: Alert for Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 3:25AM HST until December 10 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR LEEWARD KOHALA UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF HAWAII AND MAUI COUNTIES UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... .Trade winds will be especially strong today with wind speeds slowly decreasing on Saturday. The strongest winds will occur over and downwind of terrain, and in saddle areas between mountains. ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...East winds 35 to 45 mph with localized gusts over 60 mph. * WHERE...Haleakala Summit on Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
